Alle Klassen und Schnittstellen

Klasse
Beschreibung
BestenlisteFragment
A fragment that displays the leaderboard and the last attempt information if available.
GameScreenFragment
A singleton Fragment that displays the game screen and generates random labyrinths.
LabyrinthView
Custom view for displaying a labyrinth.
MainActivity
The MainActivity (Singleton) class is the entry point of the application.
MainActivity.InputMethodEnum
Enumeration for representing the current sensor source of the movement data.
MainActivity.ScreenEnum
Enumeration for representing the current screen/fragment the application displays.
MqttHandler
 
Player
Player class which represents a player with its level and completion time.
PlayerAdapter
A custom ArrayAdapter for displaying Player objects in a ListView.
PlayerController
The PlayerController (Singleton) class handles the movement and control of the player in the labyrinth game.
PlayerController.Direction
Enumeration for representing different movement directions.
SettingsFragment
A fragment that displays the settings.
SQLiteHandler
The SQLiteHandler class is responsible for handling database operations for the leaderboard.
StartScreenFragment
A singleton Fragment that displays the start screen.
